author: Jarrod Kimber
title: The tough, uncertain life of an assistant coach in T20
description: Never-ending travel, no job security, late payments, and lots of competition - it's no picnic working as support staff in leagues across the world | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Former England keeper James Foster played his last first-class match in May 2018. In the 20 months since, he has had 17 coaching gigs. He is also a consultant with the Netherlands national side and a coach at Forest School in Walthamstow, London. When he isn'… [+13776 chars]
